content.intro:
Key Eb
Koros:
Chukwu Nna nara
Nara onyinye
Nye anyiNye kwuoanyi udo.
content.chorus:
Chukwu Nna nara
Nara onyinye
Nye anyiNye kwuoanyi udo.
verses:
O Chukwu nara
Nara aja
O Nna anyi Chukwu
Gozie nke anyi

Bianu ka anyi nye
Chukwu onyinye
Achicha di ocha
Na mmanya anyi.

Nara Obi anyi
Nara oru anyi
Nara ahuhu anyi
N'ariro anyi.

Mbosi amuru anyi
K'umu nke Chukwu
Anyi kwere nkwa
lju ekwensu,

Gosi na I bu Nna
Gosi ebube Gi
Nara umu nke Gi
Nye ha udo.

Otito diri Nna
Otito diri Nwa
Dikwara Muo Nso
U'watuwa Amen.
